directions.step:
1. COMBINE SOFTENED BUTTER OR MARGARINE, BROWN SUGAR AND CHOPPED WALNUTS.
2. USE AS A TOPPING FOR WALNUT ROLLS (RECIPE NO.D-G-7-5).
Recipe Number: D04901
SERVING SIZE: 2 TABLESP
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
